full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 755 Filed 08/10/22 Page 39 of 262 1744
LC8VMAX2
Shawn - direct
1
did?
2
A. Yes.
3
Q. How did Jeffrey Epstein come up in that group of people?
4
A. Virginia said that she worked for a guy out on Palm Beach.
5
And Carolyn could make money if she wanted to come do massages.
6
Q. Were you present when Virginia said that to Carolyn?
7
A. Yes.
8
Q. About how long after you met Virginia did she bring up this topic of massages in Palm Beach?
9
10
A. Two to three weeks. Very soon.
11
Q. What do you remember Virginia saying to Carolyn about that?
12
A. That she could come out and give a guy a massage, and she would leave with a couple hundred dollars.
13
14
Q. What was the name of the guy?
15
A. Jeffrey.
16
Q. How did Carolyn respond?
17
A. She was excited to make money.
18
Q. After that conversation, do you know if Carolyn went to Jeffrey Epstein's house?
19
20
A. She did.
21
Q. How do you know that?
22
A. Because I went with her.
23
Q. Who else went?
24
A. Tony and Virginia.
25
Q. How did you all get to Jeffrey Epstein's house?
SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C.
(212) 805-0300
DOJ-OGR-00018901
